description: STEP 1 SURVEY tool. Aggregates semantic search results by domain for a given query, generating a 'research landscape map'. Returns paper count and average relevance score per domain, enabling the agent to identify 'meaningful gap' zones. This is the first tool in the 5-step workflow â€” always call it first.

configuration.query: FROM ti-papers METADATA _score | WHERE MATCH(content, ?query) | STATS paper_count = COUNT(*), avg_score = AVG(_score) BY domain | SORT avg_score DESC

query.description: Research topic to search for. Include core concepts and related technical terms. Example: 'Alzheimer disease treatment tau protein immunotherapy'
